import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useProgress } from '../context/ProgressContext'; import './Settings.css'; const Settings = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { settings, updateSettings } = useProgress(); const handleToggle = (setting) => { updateSettings({ [setting]: !settings[setting] }); }; const handleSelect = (setting, value) => { updateSettings({ [setting]: value }); }; return (

No Pressure: Timers are off by default to reduce anxiety and allow learning at your own pace.

Adaptive Learning: Our system adjusts difficulty based on performance for optimal challenge.

Visual Comfort: Soft pastels reduce visual stress while maintaining engagement.
